works.description: Our 2011 Big Ten Football article was written on July 7th by myself and can be found at the URL below. However, a website called http://www.sportingadvisoruk.com/ has been repeatedly stealing our articles and it's so obvious that he doesn't even take the time to take out our domain "NSAwins.com" from the articles he steals which is a dead giveaway that he is stealing our work. He has done this quite a few times already and it's getting really annoying. He is now even editing the date to make it look as if he posted the article before we di and it's just not right. He even uses his own name "Mitchell Kirwan" as the article author to make it seem like he wrote the article when I did. This is not the 1st time this has happened either. This guy steals our work often and I've noticed he steals others people work too. His site just steals everything and it's not right.
